name: China Minmetals
overview:
China Minemtals Corporation is an international metals and mining corporation committed to providing high-quality services globally, adhering to a development philosophy of “cherishing limited resources and pursue boundless development”. It primarily engages in exploration, mining, smelting, processing and trading for metals and minerals, and is also engaged in finance, real estate, and mining and metallurgic technology, with business scope covering 26 nations and regions in the world.

Metallurgical Raw Material Supply: Mainly undertaken by Raw Materials Business Division and Ferroalloys Business Division. Main business includes import & export, direct purchasing and sale, and commission trade.

Steel Manufacturing: Minmetals Yingkou Medium Plate Co.,Ltd (MYMP) is engaged in steel manufacturing and medium and thick steel plate processing. It possesses complete sets of modern processing facilities for steel production, including sintering, pellet-making, iron smelting, casting, steel smelting, continuous casting, and steel rolling

Client Satisfaction: Being a client centric company, we are engaged in offering a comprehensive range of products to our clients. We customize all our products to suit the specifications and requirements of our clients. With our team of experts we offer the best quality products at the most competitive prices in the market to all our esteemed clients. We accept easy modes of payments to our clients to offer hassle free transaction to our clients.

Quality Assurance: Quality is the foremost aspect of our business and never compromises at any stage of production of our Metal products. Our range of these products is tested by our quality analysts from procurement of raw materials to till the completion of the products. We check the quality of our range of products on various parameters to offer defect free range to our clients. Moreover, owing to this attribute, we have established a credible market place for our company and gained tremendous client satisfaction levels.

Team: We have a group of members in which we have engineer, designers and our R&d team, which constantly research on designs and new technology . Following are members which comprises our workforce:

Designers
Managers
Engineers
Technocrats
Administrators
Quality controllers

.
